function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Variability in governmental policies and public behaviors","category":"Lack of global governance and coordination","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Government financial support may not reach intended recipients due to bureaucratic hurdles or delays.","category":"Weak local decision-making
